item.title: Dead deer on pavement, 2nd May
item.description:

item.title: Broken glass scattered across road, 2nd May
item.description:

item.title: Small , deep pothole in the middle of the rd., 2nd May
item.description:
Whilst I was walking with my partner and cat to the vets, I was talking to my partner and cat. Then out of knowhere I was on the floor and later ended up in a&e, practitioner said I had soft tissue deep damage. I can’t walk and I’m a busy individual. I’m now having to rest and do nothing and be signed off work due to me not being able to work.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Fairfield Street, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
